function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incorrect adhesion of facial filter leading to improper protection from SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 and potential infection","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough verification of adhesion according to manufacturer's instructions, use of appropriate masks, and regular checks for structural alterations","Technologies":"Properly designed facial filters, adhesion testing equipment","People":"Individuals wearing the masks, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Use of improperly adhered surgical disposable masks leading to reduced protection from SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 and potential infection due to imperfect adherence","Mitigation":"Enhance awareness about the limitations of disposable masks, promote use of properly adhered masks, and consider using additional PPE for added protection","Technologies":"Educational materials, awareness campaigns, proper PPE storage facilities","People":"Individuals wearing the masks, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health authorities, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inadequate protection of eyes from exposure to SARS-CoV-2 due to lack of safety goggles and visors","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission through the eyes, leading to potential infection","Mitigation":"Ensure availability of certified protective goggles and visors, promote their use in close contact with infected individuals, and emphasize the importance of decontamination after use","Technologies":"Certified safety goggles and visors, decontamination protocols, training on proper use","People":"Healthcare workers, individuals in close contact with infected persons","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, regulatory bodies, manufacturers"}]}
